titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: WAITING TIME MEASUREMENT TYPE - Description

div.p: WAITING TIME MEASUREMENT TYPE Â is the same as attribute WAITING TIME MEASUREMENT TYPE.
Note: National Codes 01, 03 and 04 are not valid for the Referral To Treatment (RTT) data group in the Mental Health Services Data Set.
For specific National Code usage in different data sets, see WAITING TIME MEASUREMENT TYPE.
